Returns: The long representation of the viewing player's score, or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#PLAYER_SCORE_UNKNOWN_E@ if the player has no score for this variant.
getRawPlayerScore().Description: Retrieves the viewing player's score for this variant, if any. Note that this value is only accurate if @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#hasPlayerInfo_E@ returns true.

Returns: The score tag associated with the viewing player's score, or null if the player has no score for this variant.
getPlayerScoreTag().Description: Retrieves the viewing player's score tag for this variant, if any. Note that this value is only accurate if @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#hasPlayerInfo_E@ returns true.

Returns: The String representation of the viewing player's rank, or {@code null) if the player has no rank for this variant.
getDisplayPlayerRank().Description: Retrieves the viewing player's formatted rank for this variant, if any. Note that this value is only accurate if @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#hasPlayerInfo_E@ returns true.

Returns: The collection of scores contained by this variant.
getCollection().Description: Retrieves the collection of scores contained by this variant. Possible values are @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#COLLECTION_PUBLIC_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#COLLECTION_SOCIAL_E@.

Returns: Whether or not this variant contains score information for the viewing player.
hasPlayerInfo().Description: Get whether or not this variant contains score information for the viewing player or not. There are several possible reasons why this might be false. If the scores for this variant have never been loaded, we won't know if the player has a score or not. Similarly, if the player has not submitted a score for this variant, this will return false. It is possible to have a score but no rank. For instance, on leaderboard variants of @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#COLLECTION_PUBLIC_E@, players who are not sharing their scores publicly will never have a rank.

Returns: The time span that the scores for this variant are drawn from.
getTimeSpan().Description: Retrieves the time span that the scores for this variant are drawn from. Possible values are @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#TIME_SPAN_ALL_TIME_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#TIME_SPAN_WEEKLY_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#TIME_SPAN_DAILY_E@.

Returns: The number of scores for this variant, or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#NUM_SCORES_UNKNOWN_E@.
getNumScores().Description: Retrieves the total number of scores for this variant. Not all of these scores will always be present on the local device. Note that if scores for this variant have not been loaded, this method will return @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#NUM_SCORES_UNKNOWN_E@.

Returns: The long representation of the viewing player's rank, or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#PLAYER_RANK_UNKNOWN_E@ if the player has no rank for this variant.
getPlayerRank().Description: Retrieves the viewing player's rank for this variant, if any. Note that this value is only accurate if @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#hasPlayerInfo_E@ returns true.

Returns: The String representation of the viewing player's score, or null if the player has no score for this variant.
getDisplayPlayerScore().Description: Retrieves the viewing player's score for this variant, if any. Note that this value is only accurate if @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#hasPlayerInfo_E@ returns true.

ClassDesc: Data interface for a specific variant of a leaderboard; a variant is defined by the combination of the leaderboard's collection (public or social) and time span (daily, weekly, or all-time).
